title: Authenticating?
body:
So every time I open the client, I type all of my info in correctly...

Only to be met with the "Authenticating..." words and the constant loading icon. It's starting to piss me off, and I am really tired of listening to damn Christmas music. It's January 5th. Christmas has been over for a while now.

replies.body: It seems like your network is having problems establishing communication with our authentication servers, so it can't accept any of the login info you're submitting.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Okay, so it seems to be coming from my end (router wise). What internet ports should I unblock on said router?

Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with that!  There will be an option to automatically configure those settings.  The connection guide above can also help if you'd prefer to do it manually.  Let me know if that clears things up!
I found out it is coming from my end. Router wise. Do you know which ports need to be forwarded?
